short_definition: The presiding member of a grand or petit jury, who speaks or answers for the jury.
long_definition_html: The presiding member of a grand or petit jury, who speaks or answers for the jury.
long_definition_markdown: The presiding member of a grand or petit jury, who speaks or answers for the jury.
long_definition_text: The presiding member of a grand or petit jury, who speaks or answers for the jury.
